verses.verse: Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> after Ehud <S%H164><s%> died. <S%H4191><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> who <S%H834><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Hazor; <S%H2674><s%> and the commander <S%H8269><s%> of his army <S%H6635><s%> was Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Harosheth-hagoyim.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> for he had nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and he oppressed <S%H3905><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> severely <S%H2394><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Now Deborah, <S%H1683><s%> a prophetess, <S%H5031><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Lappidoth, <S%H3941><s%> was judging <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> at that time. <S%H6256><s%>

And she used to sit <S%H3427><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the palm <S%H8560><s%> tree <S%H8560><s%> of Deborah <S%H1683><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Bethel <S%H1008><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up to her for judgment. <S%H4941><s%>

Now she sent <S%H7971><s%> and summoned <S%H7121><s%> Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> from Kedesh-naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Behold, <S%H3808><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> 'Go <S%H1980><s%> and march <S%H4900><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Tabor, <S%H8396><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> with you ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali and from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun. <S%H2074><s%>

'And I will draw <S%H4900><s%> out to you Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> the commander <S%H8269><s%> of Jabin's army, <S%H6635><s%> with his chariots <S%H7393><s%> and his many <S%H1995><s%> [troops] to the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon; <S%H7028><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>' "

Then Barak <S%H1301><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, "If <S%H518><s%> you will go <S%H1980><s%> with me, then I will go; <S%H1980><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> you will not go <S%H1980><s%> with me, I will not go. <S%H1980><s%>"

And she said, <S%H559><s%> "I will surely <S%H1980><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> with you; nevertheless, <S%H657><s%> <S%H3588><s%> the honor <S%H8597><s%> shall not be yours on the journey <S%H1870><s%> that you are about to take, <S%H1980><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will sell <S%H4376><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of a woman. <S%H802><s%>" Then Deborah <S%H1683><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> with Barak <S%H1301><s%> to Kedesh. <S%H6943><s%>

And Barak <S%H1301><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> together <S%H2199><s%> to Kedesh, <S%H6943><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up with him; Deborah <S%H1683><s%> also went <S%H5927><s%> up with him.

Now Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite <S%H7017><s%> had separated <S%H6504><s%> himself from the Kenites, <S%H9515><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hobab <S%H2246><s%> the father-in-law of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and had pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent <S%H168><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> away as the oak <S%H436><s%> in Zaanannim, <S%H6815><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is near <S%H854><s%> Kedesh. <S%H6943><s%>
Then they told <S%H5046><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> that Barak <S%H1301><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abinoam <S%H42><s%> had gone <S%H5927><s%> up to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Tabor. <S%H8396><s%>

And Sisera <S%H5516><s%> called <S%H2199><s%> together <S%H2199><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his chariots, <S%H7393><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%> chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> [were] with him, from Harosheth-hagoyim to the river <S%H5158><s%> Kishon. <S%H7028><s%>

And Deborah <S%H1683><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Barak, <S%H1301><s%> "Arise! <S%H6965><s%> For this <S%H2088><s%> is the day <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> into your hands; <S%H3027><s%> behold, <S%H3808><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has gone <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> you." So Barak <S%H1301><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Tabor <S%H8396><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> following <S%H310><s%> him.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> routed <S%H2000><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> [his] chariots <S%H7393><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> [his] army, <S%H4264><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Barak; <S%H1301><s%> and Sisera <S%H5516><s%> alighted <S%H3381><s%> from [his] chariot <S%H4818><s%> and fled <S%H5127><s%> away on foot. <S%H7272><s%>

But Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> the chariots <S%H7393><s%> and the army <S%H4264><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Harosheth-hagoyim, and all <S%H3605><s%> the army <S%H4264><s%> of Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> by the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> not even <S%H5704><s%> one <S%H259><s%> was left. <S%H7604><s%>

Now Sisera <S%H5516><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> away on foot <S%H7272><s%> to the tent <S%H168><s%> of Jael <S%H3278><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite, <S%H7017><s%> for [there was] peace <S%H7965><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Heber <S%H2268><s%> the Kenite. <S%H7017><s%>

And Jael <S%H3278><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Turn <S%H5493><s%> aside, <S%H5493><s%> my master, <S%H113><s%> turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> to me! Do not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%>" And he turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> to her into the tent, <S%H168><s%> and she covered <S%H3680><s%> him with a rug. <S%H8063><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Please <S%H4994><s%> give <S%H8248><s%> me a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> to drink, <S%H8248><s%> for I am thirsty. <S%H6770><s%>" So she opened <S%H6605><s%> a bottle <S%H4997><s%> of milk <S%H2461><s%> and gave <S%H8248><s%> him a drink; <S%H8248><s%> then she covered <S%H3680><s%> him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to her, "Stand <S%H5975><s%> in the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> and it shall be if <S%H518><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> and inquires <S%H7592><s%> of you, and says, <S%H559><s%> 'Is there <S%H3426><s%> anyone <S%H376><s%> here <S%H6311><s%>?' that you shall say, <S%H559><s%> 'No. <S%H369><s%>'"

But Jael, <S%H3278><s%> Heber's wife, <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a tent <S%H168><s%> peg <S%H3489><s%> and seized <S%H7760><s%> a hammer <S%H4717><s%> in her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and went <S%H935><s%> secretly <S%H3909><s%> to him and drove <S%H8628><s%> the peg <S%H3489><s%> into his temple, <S%H7541><s%> and it went <S%H6795><s%> through <S%H6795><s%> into the ground; <S%H776><s%> for he was sound <S%H7290><s%> asleep <S%H7290><s%> and exhausted. <S%H5888><s%> So he died. <S%H4191><s%>

And behold, <S%H2009><s%> as Barak <S%H1301><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> Jael <S%H3278><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> him and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Come, <S%H1980><s%> and I will show <S%H7200><s%> you the man <S%H376><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you are seeking. <S%H1245><s%>" And he entered <S%H935><s%> with her, and behold <S%H2009><s%> Sisera <S%H5516><s%> was lying <S%H5307><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> with the tent <S%H3489><s%> peg <S%H3489><s%> in his temple. <S%H7541><s%>

So God <S%H430><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> pressed <S%H1980><s%> heavier <S%H1980><s%> and heavier <S%H7186><s%> upon Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> they had destroyed <S%H3772><s%> Jabin <S%H2985><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
